variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: De-identified subject ID.

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Gender of subject.

variable.name: ETHNIC_GROUP
variable.description: Ethnicity of subject.

variable.name: age_at_surg
variable.description: Age at time of bariatric surgery.

variable.name: heightIN
variable.description: Height of subject.

variable.name: weight_presurg
variable.description: Weight prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: bmi_presurg
variable.description: BMI prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: alcohol_use
variable.description: Alcohol use prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: tobacco_use
variable.description: Tobacco use prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: SYSTOLIC_BP_surg
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: DIASTOLIC_BP_surg
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: pulse_pressure_surg
variable.description: Pulse pressure prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: glucose_surg
variable.description: Serum glucose prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: insulin_surg
variable.description: Serum insulin prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: hba1c_surg
variable.description: Hemoglobin A1c prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: med_Biguanides_surg
variable.description: Use of biguanides prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: med_Insulin_surg
variable.description: Use of insulin prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: med_Sulfonylureas_surg
variable.description: Use of sulfonylureas prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: med_InsSensAgents_surg
variable.description: Use of insulin sensitizing agents prior to bariatric surgery.

variable.name: wt_2week
variable.description: Weight measure 2 weeks after bariatric surgery.
variable.comment: Closest value to 14 days but within 7 to 21 days.

variable.name: wt_1month
variable.description: Weight measure 1 month after bariatric surgery.
variable.comment: Closest value to 30 days but within 23 to 38 days.

variable.name: wt_3month
variable.description: Weight measure 3 months after bariatric surgery.
variable.comment: Closest value to 90 days but within 60 to 120 days.

variable.name: DM_MED_presurg
variable.description: Use of diabetes medication prior to bariatric surgery.
variable.comment: Diabetes medications included biguanides, insulin, sulfonylureas, and insulin sensitizing agent.

variable.name: diabetes_resolution
variable.description: Resolution of diabetes within 30 days after surgery defined as discontinued use of diabetes medication.
variable.comment: Only valued for those with diabetes medication prior to surgery and at least 180 days of follow-up after surgery.
